mapper.select: select * from CAFE where CAFENAME LIKE '%'||#{word}||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT cafe.*, (6371 * ACOS(COS(#{latitude}/57.29577951) * COS(LATITUDE/57.29577951) * COS(LONGTITUDE/57.29577951 - #{longtitude}/57.29577951) + SIN(#{latitude}/57.29577951) * SIN(LATITUDE/57.29577951))) AS distance FROM cafe ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY distance
